intro.title: A specialized pharmaceutical wholesale company that delivers medicines and medical devices to pharmacies and distribution networks throughout Russia and the CIS countries
intro.subtitle: We work with products in the fields of ophthalmology, gastroenterology, oncology, rheumatology, nephrology, hemophilia and neurology.

list.heading: We create a targeted range of pharmaceutical products that are in demand specifically in specialized fields of medicine.
list.paragraph: Instead of an extensive catalog, we provide supplies of those drugs that are really necessary for certain therapeutic areas and have high clinical significance.

list.heading: Cooperation only with trusted manufacturers and suppliers
list.text: allows us to ensure prompt and reliable delivery of the necessary medicines.

list.heading: Each client is assigned a personal manager who promptly solves work issues and helps to build an uninterrupted procurement process.
list.paragraph: This format of cooperation builds trust and promotes sustainable, long-term partnerships.

list.heading: Customers all over Russia and the CIS countries appreciate our reliability, efficiency and ease of interaction.

title: A reliable partner in ensuring
product safety and quality

list.title: Guaranteed quality.
list.text: For us, the safety and quality of the supplied drugs are a priority — speed and commercial benefits are more important. We only work with trusted manufacturers and adhere to strict control standards.

list.title: Supply stability.
list.text: The delivery process is monitored by our specialists at every stage — from product preparation to its delivery to the customer. This approach guarantees reliability and safety along the entire logistics route.

list.title: Fair terms of cooperation.
list.text: We adhere to transparent and respectful working conditions, providing partners with predictability, correctness and an equally high level of service.
Contact us to discuss how we can help you get the medicines you need.

text1: At Novirel, we work with full dedication every day, striving to ensure maximum satisfaction of our customers' needs.
Our philosophy is based on honesty, commitment to innovation and result orientation.
We are confident that the best indicator of our work is the trust and comfort of our partners, which form strong and long—term relationships.
text2: Our mission is to simplify the path of medicines from the manufacturer to the patient by providing the medical community with effective solutions based on transparency, quality and a responsible approach.
